body.note: Please fill in the type attribute values for the event element.

event.label: Label/title of the event
event.desc: Date or date-range of the eventPlease fill in the "when" attribute values for single dates or the "from" and "to" attributes for date ranges. Attibute values consisting of dates must be formatted as: YYYY, YYYY-MM, or YYYY-MM-DD. (e.g. 2010, 2010-10, 2010-10-31), location of the eventPlease link the location with a standardized geographical entity by looking up the GeoNames entry of your location and pasting its URL into the ref attribute of the placeName element.

listBibl.bibl: Source of event description and/or note optional-delete list bibl if none; multiple sources-separate bibl tags
